articles.title: Brain Implants Helped 5 People Toward Recovery After Traumatic Injuries - Yahoo News
articles.description: Traumatic brain injuries have left more than 5 million Americans permanently disabled. They have trouble focusing on even simple tasks and often have to quit...
articles.content:
Traumatic brain injuries have left more than 5 million Americans permanently disabled. They have trouble focusing on even simple tasks and often have to quit jobs or drop out of school.
